Description of the Case: Unauthorized access, hacking, or causing damage to a computer system
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment or fine up to ₹5 lakh or both
Appropriate Steps: Report to Cyber Crime Cell, change passwords, secure system

Description of the Case: Fraudulent use of another person’s identity, including fake social media profiles
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment and fine up to ₹1 lakh
Appropriate Steps: Report to social media platforms, file FIR, secure online identity

Description of the Case: Repeated attempts to contact, threaten, or intimidate a person online
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment for first offense, 5 years for subsequent offenses
Appropriate Steps: File complaint with police and cybercrime portal

Description of the Case: Publishing or transmitting sexually explicit content, including child pornography, nudes got viral
Punishment: Up to 7 years imprisonment and ₹10 lakh fine
Appropriate Steps: Report to Cyber Crime Cell and NCMEC (for child abuse)

Description of the Case: Spreading false information or defamatory content online
Punishment: Up to 2 years imprisonment, fine, or both
Appropriate Steps: File a defamation complaint in court

Description of the Case: Creating fake websites, emails, or calls to steal sensitive information
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment and ₹1 lakh fine
Appropriate Steps: Do not share sensitive details, report phishing sites

Description of the Case: Using technology to threaten national security, spread terror, or hack government networks
Unauthorized access to bank accounts, ATM fraud, or digital payment fraud
Punishment: Up to 7 years imprisonment and fine
Appropriate Steps: Notify bank, block cards, file a complaint at Cyber Cell

Description of the Case: Creating and spreading viruses, malware, or ransomware that cause system damage
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment or fine up to ₹5 lakh
Appropriate Steps: Use antivirus, avoid untrusted downloads, report incidents

Description of the Case: Unauthorized access, leakage, or misuse of personal or confidential data
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment or fine up to ₹5 lakh
Appropriate Steps: File complaint with CERT-In, report breach

Description of the Case: Running or participating in illegal online betting and gambling
Punishment: Fine of ₹5,000 or imprisonment up to 6 months
Appropriate Steps: Avoid online gambling, report illegal platforms

Description of the Case: Publishing or sharing morphed images, deepfake videos without consent
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment and fine up to ₹2 lakh
Appropriate Steps: Report on cybercrime.gov.in, take legal action

Description of the Case: Fake cryptocurrency investment schemes, hacking crypto wallets
Punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment and ₹1 lakh fine
Appropriate Steps: Verify investment sources, report fraud to RBI
